text: Chris Phillips (born February 26, 1958) is an American voice actor. He is known for his roles in Rockstar video games such as Marty Chonks and El Burro in Grand Theft Auto III and for voicing as Alex Balder, Mercenary and Killer Suit in Max Payne. He is also well known for his roles in Atari games such as Nolanoth, Thunderbelly, Lorne Starling, Koraboros and Prison Leader in Neverwinter Nights 2 and Crowley in Alone in the Dark. ==Other websites== * * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Chris Phillips
